entries.2c19c7ffd086: Statuses: Verified, Known Fake, or Unknown. Unknown means not in DB or low confidence.
entries.16e05365b923: Why should this source be reviewed?
entries.27f0d501a5ba: Auto-moderation is enabled. Reports are processed automatically using threat-intel signals and consensus thresholds.
entries.7bd40c875181: No suspicious/dangerous contributors above zero points.

entries.ee2b25b0fdd2: Parsed client-side only. Torrent anomalies are advisory, not proof of malware.

entries.75305f277796: Score combines source reputation, threat intel, TLS/redirect behavior, and metadata anomalies.
entries.5025eb79e5da: No high-risk signals were triggered from available checks.
entries.068c184da10d: Verify Downloaded Files <span0>Before You Run Them</span0>
entries.a2ef7c72407d: A security tool for executables downloaded from untrusted sources. Run scan, hash, and torrent checks before installation. Get a clear verdict in seconds: <span0>Safe</span0>, <span1>Suspicious</span1>, or <span2>Dangerous</span2>.

entries.8cc77cfe4c64: Everything you need to stay safe
entries.64bb79ec9ab6: Four layers of protection in one simple tool. No technical knowledge required.
entries.b224f9817f29: A practical workflow for download safety: source check, file scan, smart scoring, then action.
entries.df12f14cb72c: Designed for fast decisions, not blind trust
entries.7f6dcce5dbc3: Get peace of mind in seconds. No signup required, no software to install. Just drag, drop, and know if it's safe.
entries.4f4187a62263: <strong0>Disclaimer:</strong0> SafeCheck provides risk assessments based on available data. It cannot guarantee a file is safe. Always exercise caution with downloaded files.
